component: the dataset was correctly formatted and uploaded to GitHub
the variables in the dataset follow the course's naming conventions
the report was correctly formatted and uploaded as an RMarkdown file
The hypothesis statements are clear and unambiguous
the methods and format of the collected data are clearly defined
